title: Linux aclocal Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the aclocal command in Linux, learn how to generate the aclocal.m4 file, and integrate it with Autoconf for effective build automation.

meta.title: Linux aclocal Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the aclocal command in Linux, learn how to generate the aclocal.m4 file, and integrate it with Autoconf for effective build automation.
meta.keywords: Linux, aclocal, Autoconf, build automation, scripting, programming

verify.name: Verify aclocal.m4 file creation
verify.hint: The aclocal.m4 file should have been created in the current directory. Please ensure that the file is present.

verify.name: Verify aclocal.m4 file content
verify.hint: The aclocal.m4 file should contain the expected macro definitions, such as AM_INIT_AUTOMAKE. Please ensure that the file has been generated correctly.

verify.name: Verify configure script generation
verify.hint: The configure script should have been generated in the current directory. Please ensure that the script is present.
